title: Opinions on Changes in champion META since season 1
body: How do you think the Champion Meta has changed(for better or for worse) since season 1?

replies.body:
Pros:

More champions are viable

Cons:

The game is more simple, lots of champions appear to be the same within their role (most mages play the same, as do most assassins, tanks, etc)

How to fix:

More items, better adjusting, bring back unique aspects for all champions.

Well. In season 1 I played AP Ashe Mid. 
In season 5 I played Hybrid Vayne Mid. 
Build is as follows: {{item:3277}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3115}} 
My current KDA is 8/0/3 with it for 1 game. Versed a Ziggs in lane. Was pretty easy.

i think more items would flood the shop, so it would be more toward adjusting the items.
maybe certain unique passives on existing items are made to only apply to certain champs?

like for example:
health crystal:
champion passive;fortitude: taric gains +10 health per second 

etc.
that was just an example but you get the point.
what do you think?

anyway, aside from that,
i have been playing since, roughly, 2011 and i have noticed that the game has lost a lot of.. thrill..
and also people are harsh on what you do now, it used to be more open minded, not everyone hated teemo,
and it seems to me that there were nicer people on there.

idk, personally i think that community wise it was a lot richer, and lore-wise and item-wise it was a lot better.
simply because the items could be used on any champion, and they weren't too complicated, so you didn't have to think for more than 2 seconds sometimes
if you really really really should get such an item.

on a good note;
now you can undo purchases in the shop

+now we have item sets we can make

negative:
we care too much for the game and it divides us as people.
i mean really even as individuals the game can have a really bad effect on us and it used to be something you could really enjoy non-competitively,
now i find the items aren't effective enough, a lot of champions aren't effective (or atleast as easy to use) and really the atmosphere of the community has
been terrible.

especially with the recent 8 or so posts which were advertisements or rants.

over-all:
i would really enjoy it if the game was the way it was in 2011.

i can't really say on anything earlier than that because i didn't play since the start.
